caption.p: Truncated map of SARS-CoV-2 genome illustrating a subset of intra-host (blue lines) and globally collected, isolate-specific SNVs (orange lines) with respect to the genomic targets of molecular diagnostics assays (red arrows – primers, red bars - probes). Three intra-host variants (orange triangles), and two strain specific variants (Wuhan/IVD-HB-04/2020 and Chongqing/YC01/2020 - red triangles), are colocalized with the RdRP_SARSr probe (15,474 T > G), the 2019-nCoV_N1 forward primer (28,291 C > T), the HKU-N reverse primer (28,971 A > G) and the 2019-nCoV-N2 probe (29,188 T > C and 29,200 C > T). (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article).
